# Scripts

Bundled resources for anomaly-detection-system skill

- [x] data_loader.py: Loads data from various sources (CSV, databases, APIs) into a standardized format for anomaly detection.
- [x] algorithm_selector.py: Automatically selects the most appropriate anomaly detection algorithm based on the dataset characteristics.
- [x] anomaly_visualizer.py: Generates visualizations (e.g., scatter plots, histograms) to highlight detected anomalies.
- [x] report_generator.py: Creates a detailed report summarizing the detected anomalies, their severity, and potential causes.
